dialog: I recently recovered from pneumonia. What precautions should I take now?
It's important to take it easy and get plenty of rest. Gradually increase your activity level and follow a healthy diet.
Can I exercise during my recovery?
Moderate exercise can be beneficial, but listen to your body. Avoid intense workouts until you're fully recovered.
Are there any dietary recommendations for pneumonia recovery?
Eating a balanced diet with plenty of fruits, vegetables, and lean proteins can support your recovery.

You're generally not contagious once you've recovered, but it's always good to practice good hygiene to prevent any infections.
